message: Interesting little rant on why chrome (not Google's browser) is bad. Takin' a break from CNH pixels and ran across this sorta manifesto raling on chrome: http://www.3quarksdaily.com/3quarksdaily/2011/02/against-chrome-a-manifesto.html

Ok, just learning this convore thingy and I think it  needs a little work. Would be nice to have an edit function. I hit return to make a paragraph and it posted. Argh!  Anyway, I don't necessarily totally agree with this guy on why chrome is bad, but it certainly has a lot of good points and great food for thought.
yes convore is deceptively lacking in many areas
i think chrome is a memory hog though..
Yeah, well, used to be chrome was a huge memory hog, but these days, you can get away with a lot. Not that that's a good thing.
